#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int 
#define MOD 1000000007

int main()
{
	ll m,n,p;
	cin>>m>>n>>p;
	ll grid[m+1][n+1];
	
	for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++)
	for(ll j=1;j<=n;j++)
	grid[i][j]=0;
	 
	 ll i,j;
	while(p--)
	{
		cin>>i>>j;
		grid[i][j]=-1;
	}
	
	
	if(grid[1][1]==-1)
	cout<<0<<"\n";
	else
	{
	
	for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		//cout<<"*";
		if(grid[i][1]==0)
		grid[i][1]=1;
		else
		break;
	}
	
	for(ll j=2;j<=n;j++)
	{
		if(grid[1][j]==0)
		grid[1][j]=1;
		else
		break;
	}
	
	
/*	for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(ll j=1;j<=n;j++)
		cout<<grid[i][j];
		cout<<"\n";
	}*/
	
	
	for(ll i=2;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(ll j=2;j<=n;j++)
		{
			if(grid[i][j]==-1)
			continue;
			
			if(grid[i-1][j]>0)
			grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i-1][j])%MOD;
			
			if(grid[i][j-1]>0)
			grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i][j-1])%MOD;
		}
		
	}
	
	
	
	
	if(grid[m][n]>=0)
	cout<<grid[m][n]<<"\n";
	else
	cout<<0<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
